title: Poro Party Game!  Play with the poros
body:
[](http://i.imgur.com/NyRpA0b.png) Hey guys, hope your first few days into 7.15 are going well!

How many of you have ever wanted to play a round with us? Well we'd certainly like to play a round with you guys, and we're lookin' for a couple of upstanding Summoners who'd 5v5 us on the Howling Abyss! :J

Starting now, we'll be opening up a Custom ARAM game where you can play against the Boards and Twitter Support team.  We aim to start the match around 3pm pacific.  We're testing the waters and interest you guys have with this.  If we get a lot of positive feedback, it might be a continuing thing too! 

We won't be answering any big questions, we're here to just have a chill and positive game with you guys. If that sounds like your type of jam, look for the game 'Hungry Hungry Poros' and join up with the password 'porosnax'!

Hope to see ya soon!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: We've had our first community game and it went off without a hitch! Thanks to everyone who joined, and be on the lookout for our next game soon ^_^!

I'd be happy to play with you Porocles but I'm not an upstanding summoner. I'm just an average Joe.

https://m.popkey.co/4333fb/r6Vk1.gif
Git in here homie! 3 slots left ^_^
